message.content:
The task is to identify and extract the specific line item and the value of costs incurred to secure customer orders and deliver goods and services to customers.

These costs are usually found in the income statement under "Selling Expenses" or sometimes "Distribution Costs". These expenses directly relate to costs to secure customer orders and deliver goods/services.

Checking the income statement:

| Account           | Amount    | Date       |
|-------------------|-----------|------------|
| Selling Expenses  | 630420.28 | 2024-01-31 |

This is the relevant line item representing these costs.

Therefore, the answer is:

```json
{"solution": {"value": "630420.28"}}
```
